    • Method Detail

      • searchItem

        public SearchItemResult searchItem(String queryWords,
                          ItemTypeEnum itemType,
                          QueryFilterEnum queryFilter,
                          int pageId,
                          long searchInFolder)
                            throws YfyException
        Retrieve relevant files and/or folders with query words in user's account. The requests need paging param assigned by developer. Every page return 20 items.
        Parameters:
        queryWords - key words want to search for
        itemType - Type of item. see ItemTypeEnum
        itemType - Type of query filter. see QueryFilterEnum
        pageId - Page id begin with 0
        searchInFolder - Assign the folder id to search in specific folder, usually 0
        Returns:
        Object contains two lists named "folders" and "files", and other page information
        Throws:
        YfyException
